posts.post_content:
I find this card just as strong as hypnotic specter in a strict discard deck. Although you don't get the discard from damage, even a single discard (easily achieved by duress) makes it a 4/4, and difficult to block.
  
   
Play it in multiplayer with [burning inquiry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=burning inquiry) to easily make it a 14/14.
  
   
 One of my favorite alternate win conditions in my discard
posts.html:
I find this card just as strong as hypnotic specter in a strict discard deck. Although you don't get the discard from damage, even a single discard (easily achieved by duress) makes it a 4/4, and difficult to block.

Play it in multiplayer with burning inquiry to easily make it a 14/14.

One of my favorite alternate win conditions in my discard

posts.post_content:
[Raven's Crime](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Raven's Crime), [Delirium Skeins](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Delirium Skeins), [Hymn of Tourach](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hymn of Tourach), and [Cry of Contrition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cry of Contrition).  
  
Or off color: [Consult the Necrosages](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Consult the Necrosages) for versatility.  
In multiplayer the best one would probably be [Burning Inquiry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning Inquiry).
posts.html:
Raven's Crime, Delirium Skeins, Hymn of Tourach, and Cry of Contrition.

Or off color: Consult the Necrosages for versatility.
In multiplayer the best one would probably be Burning Inquiry.
